cards.name: Alaborn Cavalier
cards.text: If Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may choose to tap any one creature. (Tapped creatures can't block.)

cards.name: Alaborn Grenadier
cards.text: Attacking doesn't cause Alaborn Grenadier to tap.

cards.name: Alaborn Musketeer
cards.text: Alaborn Musketeer can block creatures with flying.

cards.name: Alaborn Veteran
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Alaborn Veteran to give any one creature +2/+2 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Alaborn Zealot
cards.text: If Alaborn Zealot blocks, destroy both Alaborn Zealot and the creature it blocks. (Destroy both creatures before you deal damage.)

cards.name: Angel of Fury
cards.text:
Flying
If Angel of Fury is put into your graveyard from play, you may choose to shuffle Angel of Fury into your library.

cards.name: Angel of Mercy
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Mercy comes into play from your hand, you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Angelic Blessing
cards.text: Any one creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Angelic Wall
cards.text:
Flying
Walls can't attack.

cards.name: Archangel
cards.text:
Flying
Attacking doesn't cause Archangel to tap.

cards.name: Armageddon
cards.text: Destroy all lands. (This includes your lands.)

cards.name: Armored Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
Attacking doesn't cause Armored Griffin to tap.

cards.name: Bargain
cards.text:
Your opponent draws a card.
You gain 7 life.

cards.name: Breath of Life
cards.text: Take any one creature card from your graveyard and put that creature into play. Treat it as though you just played it from your hand.

cards.name: Festival of Trokin
cards.text: For each creature you have in play, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Just Fate
cards.text:
Play Just Fate only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.
Destroy any one attacking creature.

cards.name: Path of Peace
cards.text: Destroy any one creature. That creature's owner gains 4 life.

cards.name: Rally the Troops
cards.text:
Play Rally the Troops only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.
Untap all your creatures.

cards.name: Righteous Charge
cards.text: All your creatures get +2/+2 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Righteous Fury
cards.text: Destroy all tapped creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, you gain 2 life. (This includes your creatures.)

cards.name: Steam Catapult
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Steam Catapult to destroy any one tapped creature.

cards.name: Temple Acolyte
cards.text: When Temple Acolyte comes into play from your hand, you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Temple Elder
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Temple Elder to gain 1 life.

cards.name: Town Sentry
cards.text: If Town Sentry blocks, it gets +0/+2 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Vengeance
cards.text: Destroy any one tapped creature.

cards.name: Warrior's Stand
cards.text:
Play Warrior's Stand only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.
All your creatures get +2/+2 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Wild Griffin
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Air Elemental
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Apprentice Sorcerer
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Apprentice Sorcerer to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.

cards.name: Armored Galleon
cards.text: Armored Galleon can't attack unless the defending player has an island in play.

cards.name: Coastal Wizard
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Coastal Wizard to return it and any one other creature to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Denizen of the Deep
cards.text: When Denizen of the Deep comes into play from your hand, return all your other creatures from play to your hand.

cards.name: Déjà Vu
cards.text: Return any one sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Exhaustion
cards.text: At the beginning of your opponent's next turn, he or she skips untapping creatures and lands.

cards.name: Extinguish
cards.text: Play Extinguish only in response to another player playing a sorcery. That sorcery has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Eye Spy
cards.text: Look at the top card of any player's library. You may choose to put that card back on top of that library or into that player's graveyard.

cards.name: False Summoning
cards.text: Play False Summoning only in response to another player playing a creature. That creature card has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Mystic Denial
cards.text: Play Mystic Denial only in response to another player playing a creature or a sorcery. That card has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Piracy
cards.text: This turn, you may tap your opponent's lands to help pay for your spells.

cards.name: Remove
cards.text:
Play Remove only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.
Return any one attacking creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Screeching Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Screeching Drake comes into play from your hand, draw a card, then choose and discard a card from your hand.

cards.name: Sea Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Sea Drake comes into play from your hand, return any two of your lands from play to your hand.

cards.name: Sleight of Hand
cards.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

cards.name: Steam Frigate
cards.text: Steam Frigate can't attack unless the defending player has an island in play.

cards.name: Talas Air Ship
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Talas Explorer
cards.text:
Flying
When Talas Explorer comes into play from your hand, look at your opponent's hand.

cards.name: Talas Researcher
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Talas Researcher to draw a card.

cards.name: Talas Scout
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Talas Warrior
cards.text: Talas Warrior can't be blocked.

cards.name: Temporal Manipulation
cards.text: You take another turn after this one.

cards.name: Theft of Dreams
cards.text: For each tapped creature your opponent has in play, you draw a card.

cards.name: Tidal Surge
cards.text: Tap any one, two, or three creatures without flying. (Tapped creatures can't block.)

cards.name: Time Ebb
cards.text: Return any one creature from play to the top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Touch of Brilliance
cards.text: Draw two cards.

cards.name: Undo
cards.text: Return any two creatures from play to their owner's hand. (You can't play Undo unless you can choose two creatures to return.)

cards.name: Wind Sail
cards.text: Any one or two creatures gain flying until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Abyssal Nightstalker
cards.text: If Abyssal Nightstalker attacks and isn't blocked, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand. (Ignore this effect if your opponent doesn't have any cards.)

cards.name: Ancient Craving
cards.text: Draw 3 cards. You lose 3 life.

cards.name: Bloodcurdling Scream
cards.text: Any one creature gets +X/+0 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Brutal Nightstalker
cards.text: When Brutal Nightstalker comes into play from your hand, you may force your opponent to choose and discard a card from his or her hand.

cards.name: Chorus of Woe
cards.text: All your creatures get +1/+0 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Coercion
cards.text: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card. Your opponent discards that card.

cards.name: Cruel Edict
cards.text: Your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures. Destroy that creature.

cards.name: Dakmor Bat
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Dakmor Plague
cards.text: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and player. (This includes your creatures and you.)

cards.name: Dakmor Sorceress
cards.text: Dakmor Sorceress has power equal to the number of swamp cards you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped swamp cards.)

cards.name: Dark Offering
cards.text: Destroy any one creature that isn't black. You gain 3 life.

cards.name: Foul Spirit
cards.text:
Flying
When Foul Spirit comes into play from your hand, destroy one of your lands.

cards.name: Hand of Death
cards.text: Destroy any one creature that isn't black.

cards.name: Hidden Horror
cards.text: When Hidden Horror comes into play from your hand, choose and discard a creature card from your hand or destroy Hidden Horror.

cards.name: Kiss of Death
cards.text: Kiss of Death deals 4 damage to your opponent. You gain 4 life.

cards.name: Lurking Nightstalker
cards.text: If Lurking Nightstalker attacks, it gets +2/+0 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Mind Rot
cards.text: Your opponent chooses and discards two cards from his or her hand. (If your opponent has only one card, he or she discards it.)

cards.name: Moaning Spirit
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Nightstalker Engine
cards.text: Nightstalker Engine has power equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: Predatory Nightstalker
cards.text: When Predatory Nightstalker comes into play from your hand, you may force your opponent to destroy any one of his or her creatures. (Your opponent chooses the creature.)

cards.name: Prowling Nightstalker
cards.text: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by other black creatures.

cards.name: Raiding Nightstalker
cards.text: Swampwalk (If defending player has any swamps in play, Raiding Nightstalker can't be blocked.)

cards.name: Rain of Daggers
cards.text: Destroy all your opponent's creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, you lose 2 life.

cards.name: Raise Dead
cards.text: Return any one creature from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Ravenous Rats
cards.text: When Ravenous Rats comes into play from your hand, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand. (Ignore this effect if your opponent doesn't have any cards.)

cards.name: Return of the Nightstalkers
cards.text: Return all the Nightstalker cards from your graveyard to play. Then destroy all your swamps. (Treat these Nightstalkers as though they just came into play from your hand.)

cards.name: Swarm of Rats
cards.text: Swarm of Rats has power equal to the number of Rat cards you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped Rat cards.)

cards.name: Vampiric Spirit
cards.text:
Flying
When Vampiric Spirit comes into play from your hand, you lose 4 life. (The person who plays Vampiric Spirit loses the life.)

cards.name: Blaze
cards.text: Blaze deals X damage to any one creature or player.

cards.name: Brimstone Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
Brimstone Dragon is unaffected by summoning sickness.

cards.name: Cunning Giant
cards.text: If Cunning Giant attacks and isn't blocked, you may choose to have it deal its damage to any one of your opponent's creatures instead of to him or her.

cards.name: Earthquake
cards.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each player and each creature without flying. (This includes you and your creatures without flying.)

cards.name: Goblin Firestarter
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may destroy Goblin Firestarter to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.

cards.name: Goblin General
cards.text: When Goblin General attacks, all your Goblins get +1/+1 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Goblin Glider
cards.text:
Flying
Goblin Glider can't block.

cards.name: Goblin Lore
cards.text: Draw four cards and put them into your hand. Then discard three cards at random from your hand.

cards.name: Goblin Matron
cards.text: When Goblin Matron comes into play from your hand, search your library for a Goblin card and put that card into your hand. Shuffle your library afterwards.

cards.name: Goblin Mountaineer
cards.text: Mountainwalk (If defending player has any mountains in play, Goblin Mountaineer can't be blocked.)

cards.name: Goblin Raider
cards.text: Goblin Raider can't block.

cards.name: Goblin War Cry
cards.text: Your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures. Only that creature can block this turn.

cards.name: Goblin War Strike
cards.text: Goblin War Strike deals to your opponent damage equal to the number of Goblin cards you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped Goblin cards.)

cards.name: Jagged Lightning
cards.text: Choose any two creatures. Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to each of them. (You can't play Jagged Lightning unless you can choose two creatures to damage.)

cards.name: Lava Axe
cards.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Magma Giant
cards.text: When Magma Giant comes into play from your hand, it deals 2 damage to each creature and player. (This includes you and your creatures, including Magma Giant.)

cards.name: Ogre Arsonist
cards.text: When Ogre Arsonist comes into play from your hand, destroy any one land. (If you're the only one with lands, destroy one of them.)

cards.name: Ogre Berserker
cards.text: Ogre Berserker is unaffected by summoning sickness.

cards.name: Ogre Taskmaster
cards.text: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.

cards.name: Raging Goblin
cards.text: Raging Goblin is unaffected by summoning sickness.

cards.name: Relentless Assault
cards.text: Untap all your creatures that attacked this turn. You may declare an additional attack this turn.

cards.name: Spitting Earth
cards.text: Spitting Earth deals to any one creature damage equal to the number of mountains you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped mountains.)

cards.name: Stone Rain
cards.text: Destroy any one land.

cards.name: Tremor
cards.text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. (This includes your creatures without flying.)

cards.name: Volcanic Hammer
cards.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any one creature or player.

cards.name: Wildfire
cards.text: You destroy four of your lands and your opponent destroys four of his or her lands. Then Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature. (This includes your creatures.)

cards.name: Alluring Scent
cards.text: Choose any one creature. This turn, all creatures able to block it do so.

cards.name: Bee Sting
cards.text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to any one creature or player.

cards.name: Deathcoil Wurm
cards.text: If Deathcoil Wurm attacks and is blocked, you may choose to have it deal its damage to the defending player instead of to the creatures blocking it.

cards.name: Deep Wood
cards.text:
Play Deep Wood only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.
This turn, all damage dealt to you by attacking creatures is reduced to 0.

cards.name: Harmony of Nature
cards.text: Tap any number of your creatures. You gain 4 life for each creature tapped this way. (Tapped creatures can't block.)

cards.name: Hurricane
cards.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each player and each creature with flying. (This includes you and your creatures with flying.)

cards.name: Ironhoof Ox
cards.text: Ironhoof Ox can't be blocked by more than one creature.

cards.name: Lone Wolf
cards.text: If Lone Wolf attacks and is blocked, you may choose to have it deal its damage to the defending player instead of to the creatures blocking it.

cards.name: Lynx
cards.text: Forestwalk (If defending player has any forests in play, Lynx can't be blocked.)

cards.name: Monstrous Growth
cards.text: Any one creature gets +4/+4 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Natural Spring
cards.text: You gain 8 life.

cards.name: Nature's Lore
cards.text: Search your library for a forest card and put that forest into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.

cards.name: Norwood Archers
cards.text: Norwood Archers can block creatures with flying.

cards.name: Norwood Priestess
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Norwood Priestess to put any green creature from your hand into play without paying for it.

cards.name: Norwood Riders
cards.text: Norwood Riders can't be blocked by more than one creature.

cards.name: Norwood Warrior
cards.text: If Norwood Warrior attacks and is blocked, it gets +1/+1 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Razorclaw Bear
cards.text: If Razorclaw Bear attacks and is blocked, it gets +2/+2 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Renewing Touch
cards.text: Choose any number of creature cards in your graveyard and shuffle them into your library.

cards.name: River Bear
cards.text: Islandwalk (If defending player has any islands in play, River Bear can't be blocked.)

cards.name: Salvage
cards.text: Take any one card from your graveyard and put that card on the top of your library.

cards.name: Sylvan Basilisk
cards.text: If Sylvan Basilisk attacks and is blocked, destroy all creatures blocking it. (Destroy the creatures before they deal damage. The Basilisk doesn't damage your opponent.)

cards.name: Sylvan Yeti
cards.text: Sylvan Yeti has power equal to the number of cards you have in your hand.

cards.name: Tree Monkey
cards.text: Tree Monkey can block creatures with flying.

cards.name: Untamed Wilds
cards.text: Search your library for a plains, island, swamp, mountain, or forest card and put that land into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.

cards.name: Wild Ox
cards.text: Swampwalk (If defending player has any swamps in play, Wild Ox can't be blocked.)
